```{r}
install.packages("panelvar")
library(panelvar)

data(Cigar)
ex1_feols <- pvarfeols(dependent_vars = c("log_sales", "log_price"),
          lags = 1,
          exog_vars = c("cpi"),
          transformation = "demean",
          data = Cigar,
          panel_identifier= c("state", "year"))
          
summary(ex1_feols)
```
